category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 7 (Dismissal of members)
contents: Article 7 (Dismissal of a member) The chairman may dismiss a member if any of the following applies. However, in cases falling under subparagraphs 5 and 6, it must be dismissed. Revised on January 31, 2019. 1. When a member declares that it is difficult for him or her to perform his or her duties. 2. When there is a case of misconduct related to his or her duties. 3. When he or she fails to comply with the obligations under Article 11-2. 4. Duties. If it is deemed unsuitable to be a member due to negligence, loss of dignity, illness, or other reasons. 5. If it does not evade despite falling under Article 11, Paragraph 1. 6. If a member submits a resignation letter at its request.
